Articles.Content:
Had to do this. In this thread, you can post pictures of your Fakemon and talk about your Pokemon ideas! I'll start this off (no picture for it).

Lotini is a Victini-like Pokemon, and is the Pokemon of loss. Instead of a V on its head, it has a slanted L. It also has the opposite colors of Victini. Many who had this Pokemon tend to lose battles very often. It is a Dark-Psychic type.
